name: Vines
example: vines/vines.zip#Small program implementing pseudo L-Systems to simulate the growth of vines. Part of a wider art nouveau project that will be implemented into this website soon.

name: Linked List
example: linkedlist/linked_list.zip#Rust-based linked list implementation. Not particularly impressive，but part of an attempt to get into Rust.

name: Mouse Babies
example: mouseBabies/Babies.zip#Program to simulate growth of mouse populations，given two mice which die within X generations，and Y generations. Weirdly difficult problem to figure out mathematically. Here because it’s fun.
